column1: Daily Weather Observations for Melbourne, Victoria for April 2025
Prepared at 13:01 UTC on Monday  6 October 2025   IDCJDW3050.202504
Most observations from Olympic Park, but some from Melbourne Airport.
On Tuesday 6 January 2015, the Melbourne (Latrobe Street) observation station  permanently closed.
Temperature, humidity, wind, pressure and rainfall observations are from Melbourne (Olympic Park) {station 086338}
Cloud, evaporation and sunshine observations are from Melbourne Airport {station 086282}
